front.title: Alternative Roots and the Virtual Inclusive Root

abstract.t: This Internet Draft discusses the 'alternate roots' and the 'virtualinclusive root', in an attempt to help clear up misunderstandings ontheir use in the Internet. This document solves the problem ofduplicate colliding top level domains by identifying the 'virtualinclusive root', in compliance with the IAB's RFC 2826, 'IABStatement on the Unique DNS Root'[1].
